description: A stunning view of snow-covered mountains under a clear blue sky.
fact: Mount Everest is the highest mountain on Earth.

description: A dense green forest with sunlight filtering through the trees.
fact: The Amazon Rainforest produces 20% of the world's oxygen.

description: A calm lake reflecting the surrounding pine trees and mountains.
fact: Glacial lakes are formed by melting glaciers.

description: Golden sand dunes under a vibrant sunset sky.
fact: The Sahara is the largest hot desert in the world.

description: Waves gently crashing on a tropical beach with palm trees.
fact: Beaches are formed by wave and wind erosion.

description: A powerful waterfall cascading down a rocky cliff surrounded by greenery.
fact: Iguazu Falls has more than 270 individual drops.
